result.execSummary:
The defendant Melvin Torres Serna was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).
  • Ignition Interlock Device Tampering/Failure to Install/Violate Court Order, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 347.413(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: To pay the costs of the action. 60 days to pay fine/costs or set up payment plan with the Clerk of Courts office.
Defendant must have a DNA sample on file with the State of Wisconsin and pay a DNA surcharge.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Melvin Torres Serna
Current: 603 Mann St, Marinette, WI 54143 United States  (Effective: 10-25-2022)
Prior: 914 N 6Th Pl, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235

10:52 AM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Melvin Torres Serna in court.  Attorney Luca Lopes Fagundes in court for Melvin Torres Serna. Lorena Mongin Sworn to interpret. Minute sheet. State gives plea agreement.  Court questions defendant on change of plea.  Rights/elements/max. penalties reviewed with defendant.  Defendant enters no contest plea to Cts. 2 & 3. Defense stipulates to factual basis to accept plea.  Court finds plea made freely, knowingly and voluntarily, accepts plea, and finds guilty of Cts. 2 & 3.  Count 1 is dismissed but read in for sentencing.  State/Defense join in sentence recommendation, make statement.  Court makes statement, imposes sentence. Bond no longer in effect.
Lorena Mongin scheduled to interpret in person on 22CM34 at 10:50 AM.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 9, 2022 at 10:50 am.

Adjustment Number: 22A 006520,
Payable Number: 100848,
Receipt Number: 22R 003095,
Amount: $20.00

11:00 AM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Melvin Torres Serna in court. Atty Luca Fagundes in court for Melvin Torres Serna. John Vaughn Sworn to Interpret. Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel.  Court questions Defendant on address/employment history. Atty Fagundes waives reading of complaint, enters not guilty plea. Court finds probable cause, sets bond. Return
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 9, 2022 at 10:50 am.
